website_summaries.verdict: No need to worry about accidentally putting too much oil on skin. The roll-on dispenses the perfect amount.
pros: Earns rave reviews from parents who roll it on the soles of their child's feet before bed
Pleasant smell that doesn't offend most people
cons: Some complain the scent fades too quickly

customer_reviews.title: Not the original formula
customer_reviews.text: It smells horrible! I had this in a 10ml bottle and loved it, that's why I decided to purchase the 30ml bottle... after trying to figure out for the longest time why there's such a difference I compared the ingredients... turns out they exchanged the sweet orange with blood orange and dont know what else, but this one stinks! Will only buy directly from edens garden website from now on (compared the ingredients listed on the 10 ml bottles, they matched the listed ingredients on website)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work well in my diffuser
customer_reviews.text: The smell is too masculine (like men's cologne) so I did not care for the scent, but the main issue was putting in my diffuser. After adding a few drops I noticed right away that it was different than my usual oils. It was very yellow like olive oil and it clung to the sides of the diffuser. After the water had run out, the inside of the diffuser was very oily and yellow looking. For that reason, I would not recommend using it in a diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: amiller

customer_reviews.title: Great brand, great blend!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Eden's Garden Stress Relief synergy blend for a couple of years now. I get so many compliments on how good it smells. I have my husband, mom, and brother using it in a roller ball. I also use it in my diffuser necklace. It is very calming and just really takes the edge off of stressful situations. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: daylillyc

customer_reviews.title: Very strong orange scent and very spreadable
customer_reviews.text: Although the bottle is just 1oz (30ml) and I was very sceptical this is surprisingly good. The smell of orange is very strong and relaxing and just few drops are enough to make everything slippery and ready for massage . Less than 1/3 of the bottle was enough for whole body massage , dough I wouldn't recommend massaging intimate area with it . Otherwise I recomend the product for couples who wants just romantic relaxing massage
customer_reviews.author: Peter Nikolov

customer_reviews.title: time to relax
customer_reviews.text: Put some of this oil in your humidifier and get ready to relax. I am very pleased w/ this oil- nice, relaxing scent. My entire family likes it and its nice to use before going to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Works Nicely!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the set of 3 Stress Relief, Anxiety Ease and Good Night. I like Stress Relief the best but wish the scent was longer lasting. I definitely noticed a change in my stress levels and motivation to start tasks I'd been putting off. Really enjoy, just wish there was a way to extend the potency of the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Khaleesi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sress relief
customer_reviews.text: By the end of the day, I'm usually tired both also stressed a bit. I stated using this.oil to relax and gently go to sleep. This is funny but I also noticed that my dogs who sleep with me were testing soundly as well!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Faris

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Nice scent but I am not certain about the quality. It gives me a bit of a headache which the higher priced brands don’t. Maybe I’m just sensitive but this is a good price but not the most quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lily L.

customer_reviews.title: Un-stress your world...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite...have been buying it for years...Always a Great scent, fast delivery....Helps me sleep..
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Stinks!
customer_reviews.text: Smells awful. It gave me a headache. It almost smells moldy. My husband said “it smells like my mortal combat action figures” in here.
customer_reviews.author: Fiveappleteacher

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know too much about essential oils but this one is great! I use it most nights and it smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great scent and relaxing. These are pricey however. I do not use mine daily because of the price. However this was one of the cheapest brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tenesha West

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: The best scent! The best product! I have tried so many essential oils, many for stress relief, and this is by far my favorite. Pop a few drops in your diffuser, or even rub some on your wrists; it will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing scent, I used this for a stress relief lotion. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too much grapefruit
customer_reviews.text: The grapefruit part of this is just overpowering, that’s pretty much all you will smell. Not that grapefruit is a bad scent, but if I wanted that I would have just ordered plain grapefruit oil, you know?
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: This is my go to stress free scent.
customer_reviews.text: I use this oil as a perfume and get tons of compliments like, "What are you wearing it smells so good!! " I don't like perfumes so this is a great alternative. I also mix with almond oil for a body oil. love this product!!! The mixture of the scents is perfect and very calming in this crazy world we live in.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite blends
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered many blends from eden garden. I like their products. This is one my favorite blends. It's a almost daily use at my place
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Works well, I use it on a daily basis at work. It has helped me relax in tense situations
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells very citrusy. Doesn't help relieve my stress, just kind of gives me a headache.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many brands of essential oils for use in homemade bath products and as room fragrances, and I really like this manufacturer. The oils don't seem diluted, the smell lingers for a long time and they don't irritate the skin or eyes. I am very pleased with this purchase, and I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: gravellatte

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite essential oil blend! I wear it almost every day and often get compliments on the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my husband and he loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and he loves it! He puts it in the diffuser every night to help him relax and sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Elana R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I always opt for a stress releif blend, this one is by far the best Ive used amd have ordered several times. I use it at the office, folks love to come by my office and take some deep breaths!
customer_reviews.author: Rylee lucido

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and Uplifting Scent
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent...It's pleasant and uplifting. I don't have an opinion about the thickness, but it's one of my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Tulip Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love the notes of Bergamot and Patchouli
customer_reviews.text: Personally I love this synergy blend essential oil, my husband does not. But it is up to taste. I am in love with Bergamot and Patchouli everywhere. Orange and Grapefruits add that citrus note. Also important is that it at least states that No pesticides, herbicides, GMO or additives

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very strong smell. Mix it with orange and evens it out.
customer_reviews.author: Kstrat

customer_reviews.title: Stress free
customer_reviews.text: I use it in water at night and it really relaxes me and i also add a few drops to the diffuser with a little lavender for a good nights sleep.

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly
customer_reviews.text: Smells sooooooo good. If I had to describe it, I'd say it smells like a salty day on the beach eating oranges.
customer_reviews.author: M. Trehern

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: has some great citrus notes, and blue tansy and a patchouli finish
customer_reviews.author: addicted to Prime

customer_reviews.title: Great for stress relief. Relaxing.
customer_reviews.text: This is a different kind of scent. It does take one or two times to get used to, but now I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: You definitely get your moneys worth with this product. It has a wonderful scent and helps calm me down after a long day. It doesnt solve all of your problems, but it does help recenter yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Torrie

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell.....I wear it with carrier oils along with the Anxiety Ease and get a lot of people who stop me to ask what I am wearing!:-)
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love love the smell of this blend, helps to calm me. A most at my office!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Smell
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure it’s a good product overall, I ordered the stress relief and all it smells like is patchouli. I really dislike that smell.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie Volkel

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the quality at this price. Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Love Eden's oils. This one really leaves you with a relaxed feeling. Totally with the price.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a massage therapist for 11 years now and have never found a better stress relief aromatherapy product. My client who like citrus absolutely live it! I find myself more relaxed and focused in the sessions that I use it in as well.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful smell
customer_reviews.text: Everyone always asks what oil this is when I’m diffusing it! Beautiful smell

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent
customer_reviews.text: This oil has a very pleasing scent. I look forward to applying it to my neck and wrists.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It actually helps me a lot with my stress levels.

customer_reviews.title: ... used other oils from Eden's garden which I have loved but this one barely has a scent
customer_reviews.text: I've used other oils from Eden's garden which I have loved but this one barely has a scent. I tried using more than double the usual amount of oil but with minimal results.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this one so bad, but it’s a little bit too much patchouli.

customer_reviews.text: I looooooove this scent. The best for sprinkling on your comforter before gong to bed!!

customer_reviews.title: it was a amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: i loved this product so much. It helped me though some really bad anxiety when other oils wouldn't work as well.

customer_reviews.text: The oil arrived empty. I’ve used this scent before so super disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite blends!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't have stress? A few drops of this blend in a mini or regular humidifier is wonderfully calming! These oil blends are wonderful and nicely priced as well!

customer_reviews.title: Very relaxing and smells so good! This is a great company all around
customer_reviews.text: Very relaxing and smells so good! This is a great company all around. I highly recommend them and this blend.

customer_reviews.text: I use this oil blend daily. It defiantly helps reduce stress. Love it!

customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Whenever I get stressed I diffuse this and it immediately helps me calm down. Works great!

customer_reviews.title: Stress free
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent. Use it in a vaporizer and in wool balls in a dryer. Leaves clothes smelling fantastic.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a soap making project. What a wonderful product, and the aroma that filled my room while the soap cured was phenomenal. The soap turned out successful. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MontanaMom

customer_reviews.title: Added to My Stress
customer_reviews.text: I used a few drops of the product in an electronic atomizer. Try it for yourself, but I found the fragrance nauseating. It made my throat burn and I did not like the fragrance at all....the Patchouli in the blend was too strong in proportion to the other herbs. The product was well packaged and shipping was fast. It pays to purchase products like this in a local store where you can try it.
customer_reviews.author: rd

customer_reviews.title: Stress Relief is Mine
customer_reviews.text: When the steam seems to be at it's height... a few little drops of Stress Relief Synergy Blend Essential Oil does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: smelled too much like a hippie and less like Bergamot
customer_reviews.text: I did not notice that this was bergamot patchouli mix yicky. It is just too heavy of a smell for anything nice. Unless maybe you are trying to cover up the smell of lets say, pot.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Awesome oil blend
customer_reviews.text: I use essential oils in my yoga and aesthetician facial business, and my clients have many different oils to choose from and combinations, however I have to say 95% of my clients always choose the stress relief from Eden’s garden. They are obsessed and I love it too! I normally don’t like ylang Ylang but it’s so subtle and the orange and Bergamont help make it not overpowering at all.
customer_reviews.author: HMBHonesty

customer_reviews.title: New fave.
customer_reviews.text: I love this and went through this size so incredibly fast because it’s amazing. I’m about to order the big bottle because I’ve been out for a couple days and it’s just become my favorite. I purchased this because I was in love with YL Peace and Calming or Stress Away but funds are a little tight and so I opted to try this. I’m so glad I did. I like to use it alone and sometimes I add a little orange to it to enchance it.
customer_reviews.author: Rawrbecs

customer_reviews.title: OMG Yessssssssssss
customer_reviews.text: Yesssssssss. My mood and nervous system quickly felt supported as this csme through my diffuser. I prefer this over the expensive brands. Smells amazing clean and pure.
customer_reviews.author: hohum

customer_reviews.title: Love this scent
customer_reviews.text: Love this scent! I teach yoga and use this in a carrier oil( A little dab on my students brow during meditation). My students LOVE it, as do I! *** UPDATE; I have been using this oil now for over a year , this is the ONLY oil that I use on my students during meditation/ svasana . It has become my signature sent for my classes and my students love it, I am always asked what it is. I've just started using it in my cool mist diffuser at home and it is soooo nice that way! A year later I still have some left in my 30ml bottle, and am ordering more, never want to be without it!
customer_reviews.author: yogamomma

customer_reviews.title: Stress Relief Synergy Blend Oil
customer_reviews.text: Another greay Synergy blend. I have used this in a large office at work filled with men that tend to stress out and I really think this has made a difference. I do not use a diffuser I just simply put a few drops on an absorbent towel and place it in front of a small desk fan. The scent blows thru the air and they seem to love it. Some of them ask for them or ask what is on the menu that day. Funny and great that I am able to use them in the office. I also use it at home and it is one of my favorites to use at night after working.
customer_reviews.author: RenFris

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me but great brand
customer_reviews.text: This is not favorite essential oil from Eden's garden. But that's my personal opinion. I highly recommend this company and there essential oils this scent was just not for me didn't like the notes in this one.
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: Great oils!
customer_reviews.text: Love these oils! Made the right, safe way. Have diffusers running in our home everyday. Surrounding yourself in different scents really makes a difference. I even travel with them and a diffuser. Great company to work with too.
customer_reviews.author: Climber

customer_reviews.title: Great mix of natural ingredients
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd time we have purchased this product and love the scent and the benefits from the oil.

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing scent
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on the scent all of the time.

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday scent.
customer_reviews.text: I love this scent. It is running almost all of the time in my diffuser. I get many compliments from visitors regarding the light, natural and (seemingly) calming scent. Even passes the husband test! Only need 1-2 drops on each diffuser fill.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Du

customer_reviews.title: For patchouli lovers
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. I got it primarily for the patchouli scent (and it is strong in this formulation). I mix it half and half with rubbing alcohol and use it as a perfume. I have used this spray as a deodorant even and I think it works quite well. This is my second purchase of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cherub

customer_reviews.title: Only Lasts About 30 Minutes, Yet Works
customer_reviews.text: The Stress Relief does help at work; however, I find I always need to add more after about 30 minutes. I add about 4-5 drops to my diffuser and the smell leaves very quickly no matter what diffuser I user. I have noticed that Young Living oils do last longer, but I can't afford their prices. :(
customer_reviews.author: C. Haacke

customer_reviews.title: Big fan of this oil!
customer_reviews.text: I love this scent! You can smell the patchouli with citrus undernotes. It is very relaxing, great for yoga or in the evenings.

customer_reviews.text: The product is great quality, I only gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because it's extremely earthy, and when I think of stress free, I think of light and breezy.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I love all there products

customer_reviews.text: Have it at my office, and apply behind my ears almost every day. It does make me relax and work much better.

customer_reviews.title: Very calming.
customer_reviews.text: The high heat and humidity this summer makes my Pomeranian very restless, as she enjoys spending time outdoors and is unable to stay out. I use this in my diffuser in the living area, and it seems to keep her much calmer. As a bonus, I have had some very nice naps on the sofa while using it! I have also used it in my diffuser necklace and could tell that it helped my stress level.

product_meta.title: Edens Garden Stress Relief Essential Oil Synergy Blend, 100% Pure Therapeutic Grade (Highest Quality Aromatherapy Oils- Anxiety & Stress), 30 ml
feature_bullets: Think of Stress Relief as your body’s bellman, relieving you of mental baggage with its calming, citrusy aroma.

Stress Relief makes it its business to help shed your stress and gift you a bit of much-deserved serenity. This synergy blend includes Sweet Orange, Bergamot, Patchouli, Grapefruit and Ylang Ylang with the express purpose of alleviating anxiety and soothing stress. To begin dissolving bad vibes, simply blend 5 drops of Stress Relief with 1 oz of carrier oil to your bath.

Women-owned and family-operated since 2009, we personally source each essential oil and raw ingredient to ensure affordable prices without compromising quality. Voted the #1 Non-MLM essential oil company, it's our pleasure to be your one-stop shop for all things aromatherapy.

As the leader in the essential oils industry, we value safety, quality and education in offering only the best aromatherapy products. For this reason, we test every batch of essential oils and provide GC/MS reports to our customers to ensure each oil’s therapeutic value and purity.

Each of our products is expertly formulated and hand-poured, including over 200 essential oils and synergy blends. We also offer a wide array of natural home and body products that are kind to the environment. Have a question about essential oils? Our certified aromatherapists are happy to lend a hand in your EO journey!
